mapper.select: select t.TRADE_TYPE, t.TRADE_TIME, t.AMOUNT, t.QUANTITY, s.S_ID, s.S_NAME, s.S_CODE, s.S_LTP, s.S_ASSET_CLASS from SC_TRADE t left join SC_STOCK_SECURITIES s on t.s_id = s.s_id where t.account_number = #{acctnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_TRADE(TRADE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, TRADE_TYPE, S_ID, QUANTITY, AMOUNT, TRADE_TIME) VALUES(#{t_id}, #{acctnum}, #{trade.trade_type}, #{s_id}, #{trade.quantity}, #{trade.amount}, #{timestamp})
